t: Orion Pictures - Audiovisual Identity Database
s: 2 weeks ago - A year later, Orion was folded into MGM, and the Motion Picture Corporation of America separated from MGM to become independent. Orion survived as an in-name-only unit of MGM during that time frame. In 2013, MGM revived the Orion Pictures brand for use on genre films, and it became a standalone ...
